web_work.desc1: GameSpeak is a live video chatting service that also allows users to play games with each other. This project utilizes the MERN Stack, Redux, Socket.io, Passport JS, and the WebRTC API. It is still a work in progress.
web_work.desc2: A very basic online flipbook Angular application that gives a step by step guide on how to believe in yourself. It served the purpose of teaching the basic concepts of routing and components.
